name: Kilouett
slogan: The ultimate app for Coffee Lovers

jobs.title: Chief Marketing Office (CMO) / Co-Founder
jobs.description:
Who we are

Kilouett (kilouett.com) is the ultimate app for coffee lovers. Kilouett enhances the customers coffee shop experience in London and Berlin.

Kilouett is a pre-seed start-up that over the last few months have collaborated with hundreds of coffee shops to define its offering. The offering has been tested with good results in the British and German markets – 40% and 25% conversation rate of new visitors respectively. Kilouett has also created a community of coffee lovers willing to test our Beta and advocate for our services. Kilouett is currently developing its MVP, which we aim to launch in the UK market in the next few months.

We are now a team of 2 co-founders, CEO and CTO and we are looking for a third team member full of enthusiasm and who can get things done. 

What we need

We are looking for a CMO to define and drive Kilouett’s marketing strategy. Our ideal CMO:
-    Is highly motivated and resilient person
-    Thinks strategically and is able to act or bootstrap fast
-    Is hands-on and is able to work collaboratively
-    Is pragmatic and able to adapt to the requirements and changing needs of start-ups
-    Deals well with uncertainty and ambiguity
-    Is happy to learn and teach at the same time
- Experience in the luxury sector is a plus
-    Speaks English and German

In the next 6 month the CMO will:
-    Define the online and off-line marketing strategy of Kilouett, with the objective to maximise the awareness of Kilouett MVP launch date
-    Align and homogenise the message of Kilouett’s website, email campaigns and App
-    Drive and execute the strategy in collaboration of the team

What we offer

-    Equity in the form of company shares
-   Great time and the opportunity to shape your own job

jobs.title: Chief Technology Officer
jobs.description:
Who we are
Kilouett is the ultimate app for coffee lovers. Kilouett offers pre-paid coffee at a discount in the best London and Berlin coffee shops.
Kilouett is a pre-seed start-up that over the last few months have collaborated with hundreds of coffee shops to define its offering. The offering has been tested with good results in the British and German markets – 40% and 25% conversation rate of new visitors respectively. Kilouett has also created a community of coffee lovers willing to test our Beta and advocate for our services.
What we need
We are looking for a CTO to build the prototype and MVP. Our ideal CTO:
-    Is highly motivated and resilient person
-    Thinks strategically and is able to define the architecture of the final solution
-    Is hands-on and is able to develop iOS mock-ups, prototypes and MVP
-    Is pragmatic and able to adapt to the requirements and changing needs of start-ups
-    Deals well with uncertainty and ambiguity
-    Is happy to learn and teach at the same time
-    Speaks English and German
In the next 6 month the CTO will:
-    Develop/code the mobile app Beta ready to be tested by coffee lovers and coffee shops alike
-    Present the solution to business angels, VCs and corporations interested in investing in Kilouett
What we offer
-   Equity in the form of company shares
-   Great time and the opportunity to shape your own job
